title: Goon
description: Micah’s always been a goon. You know, one of those big beefy guys that stand behind the important person, looking threatening. He first got a reputation for being a goon in boarding school. When he joined the Army, he was just another goon among dozens, but now that he’s a private security contractor, he’s one of those goons always guarding doorways and making sure the wrong people don’t go in the wrong room at the wrong time.It kind of figures that when Micah is the one stepping into the room at just that perfect moment, his whole life changes in the blink of an eye…
author: Dan Kirk
